oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville's Easter fashion parade, 1936 April 12
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of a young woman walking down 6th Avenue North toward the Tennessee State Capitol in her Easter finery. The Hermitage Hotel and parking lot across the street can be seen in the background. Similar photos appeared in the Nashville Banner newspaper April 13, 1936. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3.25 x 4.25 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Architecture; Buildings; Capital City; Downtown Nashville; Popular Culture; Religion; Shopping; Clothing and dress--Tennessee--Nashville; Easter--Tennessee--Nashville; Women's clothing--Tennessee--Nashville

oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nashville Banner staff photographer
